title: John Coltrane - Live at the Village Vanguard Again! (1966)
description:
'If you have ears to hear, if Coltrane speaks to you, "Live at the Village Vanguard Again" is decidedly a five-star album, for it's all there - the fire, the conviction, the burning honesty, the fervor, the total playing.' (Pete Welding, Downbeat, 1967)

John Coltrane is magnificent as ever during this May 1966 performance. Two familiar Coltrane staples (an incredibly soulful version of "Naima", and a very fierce version of "My Favorite Things") are explored at length. Many admire this album Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and every note Coltrane blew is worth hearing.
